EmailTemplate.name: MyCase Support Closed tNPS Email
EmailTemplate.subject: MyCase Support Customer Experience Survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
We wanted to follow up with you in regards to your recent experience with MyCase support.
We are committed to making your MyCase support experience the best possible! To help us do that we would like to invite you to please take a moment to complete this brief survey:
https://www.surveygizmo.com/s3/7196916/NEWCO-MyCase-Support-Experience-Survey?c={!Case.ContactId}&a={!Case.AccountId}&ca={!Case.Id}&e={!Case.OwnerId}
Thank you for sharing your feedback!
Adam Wilson Vice President, Client Services MyCase www.mycase.com
